EmailTemplate.name: 201904_Americas_Email_IMU_3D Mapping_JRD.201904_Americas_Email_IMU_3D Mapping_V4
EmailTemplate.subject: How Can We Help?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Honeywell’s HGuide inertial sensors and navigation team is here to help you choose the right IMU or navigator to meet your price and performance requirements.
Here’s a few links we’ve found to be helpful to our 3D mapping customers:
- Aeroscout Achieves Precise Location Accuracy With Honeywell Navigator <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/case-studies/2019/march/honeywell-navigator-delivers-precise-location-accuracy]]> - Autonomy Spotlight: Honeywell HGuide n580 Navigator Delivers Precise Nav Data to 3D Mapping <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2019/april/autonomy-spotlight-honeywell-hguide-n580-navigator-reliably-delivers-precise-data-for-3d-mapping]]> - Honeywell HGuide n580 Inertial/GNSS Product Overview <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/navigation-and-sensors/hguide-n580]]> - Honeywell HG4930 MEMs Inertial Measurement Unit Overview <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/navigation-and-sensors/hg4930]]>
For a limited time, you can try a Honeywell IMU or navigator before you buy*. Contact us today to learn more.
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/IMU_V1.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_imu_gh&utm_content=marketo]]>
*Try before you buy program is subject to availability and execution of Honeywell’s bailment agreement. Limit one (1) product per customer. Customer must return unit in 30 days from the time the unit is received. Customers who do not return the unit within 30 days will be charged full MSRP at standard Honeywell terms and conditions.
